Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the slopes of Hafnia Mountain, south of the Ituk Glacier.
Room.LongDescription: Snow swirls around you, and at this elevation snow stays on the ground all year round. Several times a year the road crew finds a frozen traveler, so be warned. This is not a friendly part of the world. There is an odd occurance of a hot draft of wind occasionally from the south, probably from one of the active cinder cones that make up the Aphinix Mountain Range.
